tag_list: katrina-klier, katrinaklier, digital-marketing, microsoft, hp, ge, mci
overview:
Katrina Klier is the Worldwide Senior Director of Digital Marketing for Microsoft. She leads digital marketing, communications and virtual account management for the global OEM division. Previously, Katrina led partner readiness for the US and sales for the learning solutions channel at Microsoft.

Prior to Microsoft, Katrina was a key leader in building the Linux and Open Source business for HP. She also worked in the telecom sector at MCI and began her career at GE.

Katrina speaks frequently on digital marketing, building communities and women in technology. You can find her on Twitter @KatrinaKlier, on LinkedIn and hear her own thoughts on her blog at blog.KatrinaKlier.com
